description: Asana workspace structure and priority sources. Hybrid config: caches workspace structure AND marks priority items for targeted skill access. Populated by /sync-asana.

usage.search_priority: When gathering Asana context, check priority items first (sources.*.priority arrays), then search broadly when needed. Asana is the company-wide task manager - frame results as cross-functional, not engineering-specific.
usage.skill_integration: Skills should load this config and query relevant sources based on context type (strategic goals -> goals, cross-functional work -> projects, organisational view -> portfolios).
usage.linear_dedup: When the same work appears in both Linear and Asana, Linear takes precedence for engineering work. Asana tasks whose titles closely match a Linear ticket should be noted but not duplicated.
